definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Yes, I want a sweater for my daughter, please.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想買一件毛線衣給我女兒。

sentences.english: Knitting is a very tedious work.
sentences.chinese: 編織毛線衣，是很費神耗時的工作。

sentences.english: If you don't wear a sweater, you will get cold.
sentences.chinese: 要是不穿毛線衣，你會着涼的。

sentences.english: She bundled herself up in several warm sweaters before going out into the freezing cold.
sentences.chinese: 外面天寒地凍，她外出前套了幾件暖和的毛線衣。

sentences.english: Take your sweater off in this warm room.
sentences.chinese: 在此熱烘烘的房間內，把你的毛線衣脫掉。

sentences.english: Which sweater do you like better?
sentences.chinese: 哪件毛線衣您更好喜歡？
